intelligence.target_persona: Local car owners with well-maintained sedans and SUVs who want a premium detail at home or work

brand.name: Biff-Buff
brand.tagline: Premium Mobile Car Detailing — At Your Home or Work
brand.objection_handle: You don’t have to drive or wait at a shop. I bring professional tools and careful technique to your driveway or workplace, so your vehicle looks its best on your schedule.

hero.headline: Premium Mobile Car Detailing — At Your Home or Work
hero.subtext: High-end interior and exterior detailing for sedans and SUVs. Convenient, careful, and appointment-based — serving local owners who want their vehicle looking showroom-clean without leaving home.

image.alt: A luxury SUV being professionally detailed on a driveway
image.image_search_query: mobile car detailing professional working on luxury suv driveway close-up

about.story_text: Biff-Buff is a mobile detailing service built for local owners who care about their vehicles. Instead of wasting time at a shop, you get professional-level detailing at your home or workplace — with the tools, products, and attention to detail your car deserves.
about.founder_note: I treat every vehicle like it’s my own — from the first rinse to the final wipe-down. My goal is simple: make your car look incredible, and make the process effortless for you.

features.title: Mobile Convenience
features.description: I come to your home or workplace with professional equipment — you keep your day moving while your car gets detailed.

features.title: Interior Deep Clean
features.description: Vacuuming, wipe-downs, and focused interior cleaning to restore a clean, fresh cabin feel without shortcuts.

features.title: Exterior Detail Finish
features.description: Thorough wash and finish for a crisp, glossy look — perfect for daily drivers and weekend cars alike.

features.title: Care for Nice Cars
features.description: Detail-minded approach designed for owners who want careful handling and consistent, high-quality results.

image_source.image_search_query: professional car detailing before and after interior exterior close-up

items.title: Paint-Safe Hand Wash
items.caption: A careful exterior clean that brings back shine without harsh shortcuts.
items.image_search_query: professional hand car wash detailing foam luxury car driveway

items.title: Interior Refresh
items.caption: Clean, tidy cabin feel — the kind you notice immediately when you open the door.
items.image_search_query: car detailing interior cleaning vacuum seats dashboard close-up

items.title: Detail Brush Precision
items.caption: Focused work on the small areas that separate a quick wash from a real detail.
items.image_search_query: car detailing brush cleaning vents badges trim close-up

items.title: SUV Ready Finish
items.caption: Premium mobile detailing results for SUVs — at home or at work.
items.image_search_query: mobile car detailing luxury suv exterior shine driveway

items.title: Gloss & Reflection
items.caption: A crisp finish that looks great in sunlight and under street lights.
items.image_search_query: detailed car paint glossy reflection close-up after detailing

service_area.travel_note: Outside these areas? I can often accommodate extended travel with a custom quote.

contact.headline: Book Your Mobile Detail
contact.subheadline: Tell me what you drive and where you’d like the detail done. I’ll confirm availability and lock in your appointment.
